section.title: System Studio Files and Folders
section.para: System Studio has several key files and folders, listed in the table below.

row.entry: System Studio looks for this file to locate systemstudio configuration. See the systemstudio and systemstudio.conf man pages for more information. This file is optional and does not exist in the default System Studio installation.
Python code for System Studio, where $version is the Python version.
Documentation for System Studio, where $version is the System Studio version.
Relax NG schemas for repository definition validation.
Templates for use in definition creation. See the section on in the Glossary of Terms for more information.
System Studio stores cached content in this folder. See the systemstudio and systemstudio.conf man pages for cache-related options.
Location where System Studio stores variable data including data for troubleshooting installed config-rpm and deployment scripts.

System Studio publishes completed repositories to system and package subfolders of this folder by default. An alternative location can be specified on a per-repository basis within a repository definition.
